content: new word so it will be 3 + 7 r + 3 letter space + 1 e + 3 letter space + 5 s + 3 letter space + 3 i + 3 letter space + 5 s + 3 letter space + 3 t + 4 end space = 46 our repeating motif is 46 stitches i made my scarf with 4 repeating motifs alternating 4 motifs 3 motifs 4 motifs etc to give a staggered look tbh if i was going to redo i would have done 5 motifs as it s not as long as i d like it to be since it is so wide it eats up the length when it s wrapped around the pattern given will still work if you increase your repeating motifs to 5 if you re doing a 7 stripe scarf *definitely* increase by a motif or even two **if you are using another weight of yarn make sure the length is sufficient before you start thinner yarn will mean more repeating motifs to get the length bulkier is not recommended for *this* one or you may end up with a scarf wide enough to be a blanket with all the stripes adjust as you need scarf pattern this is for worsted weight yarn and a 5mm hook chain 184 + 2 the 184 will be the length 4 x 46 the plus two will give you the length to start your 1st double_crochet row *if you re repeating 5 times chain 230 + 2 6 repeats will be 276 +2 ect note -
